editions.flavor: "These walls may hold secrets but don't we all?"
"I told you that you'd be amazed!"

effect: **On Enter:** You may banish two cards at random from your memory. If you do, level up your champion. *(Your champion levels up into a compatible champion card from your material deck, ignoring materialization costs.)*
effect_raw: On Enter: You may banish two cards at random from your memory. If you do, level up your champion. (Your champion levels up into a compatible champion card from your material deck, ignoring materialization costs.)
name: Dungeon Guide

result_editions.flavor: "I told you that you'd be amazed!"

rule.description: When opting for Dungeon Guide's effect, you may choose to fail to find a champion card from your material deck.
Dungeon Guide's ability of banishing two cards from your memory is not considered a cost. This means that you can't use Floating Memory to pay for this effect.

effect_html: On Enter: You may banish two cards at random from your memory. If you do, level up your champion. (Your champion levels up into a compatible champion card from your material deck, ignoring materialization costs.)

editions.flavor: The emperor's gates are well-watched with these soldiers' dutiful eyes and faithful hearts.
Important duties among front-line soldiers include the occasional instruction of trainees at the academy.

effect: **Floating Memory** *(While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)*
effect_raw: Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
flavor: “Advance! Keep them away from the gates until reinforcements arrive!”
name: Honorable Vanguard

result_editions.flavor: Important duties among front-line soldiers include the occasional instruction of trainees at the academy.

effect_html: Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)

editions.effect: **On Enter:** Rest target unit. **Class Bonus:** Until end of turn, if that unit would take damage, it takes that much damage plus 1 instead.
editions.effect_raw: On Enter: Rest target unit. Class Bonus: Until end of turn, if that unit would take damage, it takes that much damage plus 1 instead.
editions.flavor: The ocean's effervescence provides a much needed soothing calm in the sweltering heat.

editions.flavor: From the shock and panic of accidentally slipping into the cold water, Silvie forgot how to swim.

effect: Target player puts the top three cards of their deck into their graveyard.
effect_raw: Target player puts the top three cards of their deck into their graveyard.
flavor: In that deep and quiet comfort, do not lose sight of the surface.
name: Sink into Oblivion

result_editions.flavor: From the shock and panic of accidentally slipping into the cold water, Silvie forgot how to swim.

editions.flavor: An eligible trainee from the Imperial Examination. Even the lowest score qualifies all the same.
Nothing better than building snowmen and indulging in a warm flame on a snow day.

effect: **On Enter:** Deal 2 damage to your champion. Draw a card.
effect_raw: On Enter: Deal 2 damage to your champion. Draw a card.
flavor: A mage, by all intents and purposes. However, you might want to keep her away from a wand.
name: Clumsy Apprentice

result_editions.flavor: Nothing better than building snowmen and indulging in a warm flame on a snow day.

effect_html: On Enter: Deal 2 damage to your champion. Draw a card.

editions.effect: [Class Bonus] [Level 2+] Other allies and weapons you control get +1 [POWER].
editions.effect_raw: [Class Bonus] [Level 2+] Other allies and weapons you control get +1 POWER.
editions.flavor: Their passion and fervor on the battlefield inspire fellow warriors to ascend in strength.
editions.effect_html: Class Bonus Level 2+ Other allies and weapons you control get +1.
